text.__SUMMARY__: Shorea lissophylla is a species of plant in the Dipterocarpaceae family. It is endemic to Sri Lanka.
text.Sources: Ashton, P. (1998). "Shorea lissophylla". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T30813A9579438. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T30813A9579438.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
